text: I think we are making progress whether
that progress would be enough for the
conference will take place soon it is
not certain yet but we are certainly
making progress and having a series of
meetings in Geneva to prepare for two
for the conference and I hope that we
will announce a date soon what are the
aspects that give you hope because many
people are very skeptical what have you
seen that convinces you that this is
making progress I think people are
realizing more and more that there is no
military solution and they don't see any
other way of getting out of his horrible
situation except through Geneva this is
what gives me hope and what is still the
major obstacle toward the holding of the
conference on November the 23rd you know
that I think many one of them is that
the opposition is still trying to put
together their ideas and agree to come
to Geneva and form the delegation and
also I think we need a little bit more
work for
to make sure who is quite glad that
there is no prank
